name: LD49 Entry: Uns' Table
description:
Entry for LD49

Uns the Minotaur raided a caravan and found himself a rather nice table. 

But after setting it up he realized the table was unstable, which upset him so Uns flips the table. 

WARNING:  Unstable animals have been spotted in the area, They may explode on contact.

If I had another day I would have improved optimization and reduced the game size. 
This is my first LD entry.

!!!!!!!!!!!UPDATE!!!!!!!!
One Change has been made to the game after the original upload.  Now there is a different camera that can be toggled from the main menu because the camera was a common complaint.
